pearpackagev2.name: Text_CAPTCHA
pearpackagev2.description: Implementation of CAPTCHAs (completely automated public Turing test to tell computers and humans apart)
pearpackagev2.changelog: * Fixed some invalid/broken tags in package.xml
* Fixed some invalid/broken tags in package.xml
* Bug #20201 license file does not exist, causing error on upgrade.
First stable release * no changes since last beta release

First PHP5 release * use phing to build package * extend test cases * Bug #19858 Figlet: _createPhrase duplicates parent method * Bug #19891 undefined function init() * Request #5055 Enhance _createCAPTCHA method to use user-defined colours * Request #19854 No reason for Figlet double-options: $options['options']['font_file'] * dependency for Image_Text to version 0.7.0
QA release * Request #11653 Text_Password::create() call * Bug #12578 incorrect/incomplete license in package.xml * Request #16433 Image Driver: If image is too small, no text is created

+ ** license change from PHP license to BSD license ** + implemented feature request #16433 (fixing behavior from bug #13478): If image is too small, no text is created (patch by tacker) + implemented feature request #11653: new 'phraseOptions' setting to provide options to Text_Password::create() call + updated and new examples + various cosmetic changes
+ implemented feature request #11957: Providing better Image driver error messages in various places + fixed example/documentation bug #11960 + various cosmetic changes

+ new feature: now supports setting background and line color for image CAPTCHAs (see CAPTCHA_test.php example file). Requires Image_Text >= 0.6.0beta to work. Many thanks to isnull! + bugfix: CAPTCHA drivers now also load Text/CAPTCHA.php via require_once (suggested by Philippe Jausions)
+ bugfix: image height could not be set (reported by Hendrik Vorwerk) + cosmetic changes

*********************************** ********* MERRY CHRISTMAS ********* *********************************** *********************************** *** Upcoming BC BREAKING CHANGES ** *********************************** + CAPTCHA options are now provided as one array (wormus' suggestion) + image CAPTCHA is now only created upon request, making it serializable (jausions' suggestion) + New drivers: Figlet (wormus), Word (toby), Numeral (davidc), Equation (cweiske) + some other stuff ...
+ fixed a bug in the sample (noticed by Nima Sadjadi)
+ cosmetic changes (CS) + small changes sample script (suggested by Lukas Smith, thanks!)
+ better check for errors thrown from Image_Text + updated examples + cosmetic changes
Bugfix release + fixed bug #3271 (thanks to Justin) + some cosmetic changes
Bugfix release (Int'l PHP Conference Edition) + fixed bug #2584 (thanks to wormus) + various small fixes
